author: RTÉ News
title: Energy consumption by families up as much as 20%
description: Energy consumption in family homes is up between 11% and 20% as more people stay at home, according to a study from energy company Pinergy and property group Savills.
content:
Energy consumption in family homes is up between 11% and 20% as more people stay at home, according to a study from energy company Pinergy and property group Savills. 
The new study highlights the impact that the latest Covid-19 restrictions are having on ch… [+876 chars]
